OpenBeta is not intended to be an official resource for Federal spending data. For official Federal Spending data, please visit USAspending.gov. An official website of the United States Government

What is OpenBeta?

A new way to build government websites

OpenBeta.usaspending.gov is the feedback platform for features and functionality being considered for the future of USAspending.gov. You will find ongoing discussions on our development of the site which we encourage you to join.

Learn more

What can you do here?

Collaborate with the site developers

Visit the Concepts page to see what we are currently developing and voice your thoughts, concerns, and suggestions in ongoing discussions.

Learn more

Why does OpenBeta matter?

Collaborate with the site developers

OpenBeta presents an exceptional opportunity for everyone interested in Federal spending to shape and influence how you access Federal spending data. On OpenBeta, you can give feedback on the design and functionality for the future of USAspending.gov. With your help and participation, the discussions on openbeta.usaspending.gov will guide us in building a website that best serves your needs.

Learn more

Visit Federal Spending Transparency to see the process for the implementation of the DATA Act requirements.
